title: Reduce Lotteryticketprice to 1 $CAKE & increase winning chances
body:
1. Reduce price for one Ticket to 1 $CAKE

-> more participants
-> higher pot

2. Increase winning chances

Currently we have 10 wins in 10 000 ticketnumbers.

Example: Draw shows "1932"

1932	1 : 10 000

193x	1 : 2 500
19x2
1x32
x932

19xx	1 : 1 666, 67
1x3x
1xx2

x93x
x9x2
xx32

I want to see:

1 random match*:		    share	 2 % of the pot
2 random:				"	 3 %        "
3 random:				"	 5 %        "
2 exact order**:			"      10 %        "
3 exact order:			"      15 %        "
4 random:				"      15%         "
4 exact order:		        "      40 %       "

BURN					       10 % of the pot
                                            ----------------------------
						       100 %

*) you get a share of the pot no matter if your matching number of your ticket number is in the same position as the drawn number or not

**) higher wins if hitting exact order

3. Still implement the 10 cakes/block to push the pot
author: 0x966B1F330B7d574a24CC552BfD194895d283F527
